publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2254 Alex Neil: War Crimes in Iraq—That the Parliament calls for the prosecution of President George W Bush and the Prime Minister for war crimes, given that the US administration and Her Majesty’s Government have now effectively admitted that there were no weapons of mass destruction in Iraq, which was the basis upon which they justified what many consider to be their illegal war against Iraq.

S2M-2254 Alex Neil: War Crimes in Iraq—That the Parliament calls for the prosecution of President George W Bush and the Prime Minister for war crimes, given that the US administration and Her Majesty’s Government have now effectively admitted that there were no weapons of mass destruction in Iraq, which was the basis upon which they justified what many consider to be their illegal war against Iraq.
S2M-2254 War Crimes in Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2005) Colin Fox*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-2254 War Crimes in Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-2254 War Crimes in Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2254 War Crimes in Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2005) John Swinburne*
